name: PS5 Controller UI [Mockups]
description:
An exciting milestone was reached by Sony with the introduction of DualSense, the New Wireless Game Controller for PlayStation 5. 🎉🎮


Just right in time, here is a realistic mockup of the controller to play with. Made completely with Figma, using shapes, shadows, colours and some textures.


Just duplicate and use for free 🎮


🍻Cheers to the community
